thread.title_full: Kiwi Sheepskins reviewed by Lisa A. (Chicago, IL)

author: Lisa A. (Chicago, IL)
title: Kiwi Sheepskins reviewed by Lisa A. (Chicago, IL)
text: I'm a repeat customer of Kiwi Sheepskins. At one time I bought sheepskin rugs from a few different vendors, and Kiwi Sheepskins' was definitely the softest and most luxurious one. I have never bought sheepskins from anywhere else now. Customer service is amazing and very friendly. Shipping is super fast too, considering it goes across the globe from NZ to US. Thank you so much, you got a customer for life!
